DOC.brief_summary: This RCT randomly assign 40 CBOs receive Multimedia intervention training package ( Multimedia ) 40 receive original , manualized Connect intervention training package ( Traditional ) . The technology transfer process involve agency receive four day train two planned technical assistance conference call , study investigative staff , first four month follow training . Telephone assessment complete 6 staff agency measure primary outcome , mediating , moderate process measure variables baseline , 6 , 12 18 month post-technology transfer . The primary outcome study adoption Connect intervention . The unit analysis CBO .
DOC.brief_title: Using Multimedia Technologies Disseminate HIV Prevention
DOC.criteria: To eligible study , CBOs must report 501c3 status ; provide least minimum level direct contact HIV prevention service clientele ; target population service include heterosexual men woman .
